item.description: Gin run: router := gin.Default() router.Run() // router.Run(":3000") for a hard coded port //net/http s := &http.Server{ Addr: confs.FlagSericePort, Handler: router, ReadTimeout: 10 * time.Second, WriteTimeout: 10 * time.Second, MaxHeaderBytes: 1 << 20, } s.ListenAndServe() “/user/:name/*action” name := c.Param(“name”) action := c.Param(“action”) firstname := c.DefaultQuery(“firstname”, “Guest”) lastname :=c.Query(“lastname”) // shortcut for c.Request.URL.Query().Get(“lastname”) message := c.PostForm(“message”) nick := c.DefaultPostForm(“nick”, “anonymous”) binding:“required” / binding:"-”
